summary: Ryoichi and Chikako are brother and sister. They live together. Chikako works during the day in an office and at night she prostitutes herself to fund her brother's studies at the ... See full summary »
cast: Yoshiko Okada|Ureo Egawa|Kinuyo Tanaka|Shin'yô Nara|Chishû Ryû
title: Una mujer de Tokyo
